document_data.name: Royal Harim of Huzuz
document_data.mainbody: The '''Royal Harim of Huzuz''', or simply the '''Royal Harim''', was part of the complex of the [[Palace of the Enlightened Throne]] in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Royal Harim was one of the largest sections of the palace. It contained dormitories, beautiful gardens, and opulent suites.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Royal Harim was the home to the [[Grand Caliph]]'s many wives and concubines as well as their slaves, servants, and guards
document_data.Rumors and Legends: A secret tunnel, known only to the inhabitants of the harim, was used to escort men into the harim. The men were usually dressed as women.
